sql-statements.statement: SELECT oce.code, oce.name AS name, oce.description AS description, ( SELECT count (*) FROM offering_catalog_entry WHERE parent_entry_id = oce.entry_id ), entry_id FROM Offering_catalog oc,offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE oce.code = ? AND oc.catalog_type =2 AND oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oce.entry_type = 230 AND rownum <= 250

SELECT oce.code, oce.name AS name, oce.description AS description, ( SELECT count (*) FROM offering_catalog_entry WHERE parent_entry_id = oce.entry_id ), entry_id FROM Offering_catalog oc,offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE oce.code like ? AND oc.catalog_type =2 AND oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oce.entry_type = 230 AND rownum <= 250

SELECT oce.code, oce.name AS name, oce.description AS description, ( SELECT count (*) FROM offering_catalog_entry WHERE parent_entry_id = oce.entry_id ), entry_id FROM Offering_catalog oc,offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE upper(oce.description) = ? AND oc.catalog_type =2 AND oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oce.entry_type = 230 AND rownum <= 250

SELECT oce.code, oce.name AS name, oce.description AS description, ( SELECT count (*) FROM offering_catalog_entry WHERE parent_entry_id = oce.entry_id ), entry_id FROM Offering_catalog oc,offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE upper(oce.description) like ? AND oc.catalog_type =2 AND oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oce.entry_type = 230 AND rownum <= 250

SELECT oce.code, oce.modifier, cet.caption, oce.name, oce.entry_id FROM offering_catalog_entry oce, catalog_entry_type cet WHERE oce.parent_entry_id = ? AND oce.entry_type = cet.id (+) AND rownum <= 250

SELECT oce.code, oce.name AS name, oce.description AS description, ( SELECT count (*) FROM offering_catalog_entry WHERE parent_entry_id = oce.entry_id ), entry_id FROM Offering_catalog oc,offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE upper(oce.name) = ? AND oc.catalog_type =2 AND oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oce.entry_type = 230 AND rownum <= 250

SELECT oce.code, oce.name AS name, oce.description AS description, ( SELECT count (*) FROM offering_catalog_entry WHERE parent_entry_id = oce.entry_id ), entry_id FROM Offering_catalog oc,offering_catalog_entry oce WHERE upper(oce.name) like ? AND oc.catalog_type =2 AND oc.org_internal_id = ? AND oce.catalog_id = oc.internal_catalog_id AND oce.entry_type = 230 AND rownum <= 250
